solution_line_template: They need {total_normal_rain_per_year} inches of rain a year to average {normal_daily_average_rain} inches a day because {days_in_year} x {normal_daily_average_rain} = {total_normal_rain_per_year}

They need {average_rain_needed_per_day} inches a day because {rain_needed_more} / {days_left_in_year} = <<{rain_needed_more}/{days_left_in_year}={average_rain_needed_per_day}>>{average_rain_needed_per_day}
